description: Perfect for summer alfresco dining, try this nutritionally approved prawn pizza that's topped with juicy prawns, creamy ricotta and peppery rocket.
name: Prawn Pizzas With A Healthier Twist Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 thin crust high protein pizza bases
14 cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place pizza base on trays.
Combine passata, oregano and garlic in a small bowl. Spread pizza bases with passata mixture. Bake for 10 minutes or until bases are just golden.
Meanwhile, place basil and oil in a small food processor and process until finely chopped.

Dollop ricotta over pizzas, spoon over basil mixture and top with prawns. Bake for a 3 minutes or until prawns are warmed through. Remove trays from oven. Top pizzas with extra basil and some rocket leaves, then serve with a green salad.
